column3: “I smoked this great plant recently...at a concert...and it surpassed all expectations. The euphoria was clear and persistent. Everything seemed hilarious and we were all the greatest comedians on earth. We ended up smoking this with fellow MJ lovers after the show and they were all amazed by the effects. Talkative, happy and all-around just great time. Definitely try this if you have the chance. I assure you that you...”

“Jesus is definitely the right name for this strain, it's a super potent Hybrid and a very potent smoke. As soon as you exhale and feel it's effects you'll understand why it's named Jesus. I can smoke this strain day or night and it helps alot with headaches, spams, anxiety and depression. Definitely a top shelf" strain and definitely worth a try as this strain will not let you down!”"

“I really like this new version of Jesus by Solstice for a few reasons... 
First is the huge, dense colas frosty with tricomes, so this plant was well cared for and it shows!

Second, I love the aroma; the cured bud is spicy with notes of Vanilla, but when you smoke it, the smell changes to mildly nutty and pine.

Third the high is very mild, mellow, relaxing with no paranoia" or anxiety.  It is 60%  Indica and a bit...”"

“I would describe the feeling Jesus provides as cool, calm, and collected. Despite the relatively high THC content, Jesus was not too heavy. I felt relaxed and mellow and would recommend this strain for easing anxiety and for pain relief.”

“I loved this strain. Almost immediately upon the first exhale, my back and leg pain vanished. It was also a little bit trippy and it played some games with my mind, but in a good way. It relaxed me and took away all of my ailments. The sleep I had while I was on this was fantastic too. Great strain and a great experience.”

“I vaped some of this around Halloween 2014. I took the dog out for a walk in the dark and misty night and started getting a little tripped out at the window decorations and spookiness. It's a bit too cerebral for me outside of a controlled environment but fun at home. I love Solstice's products. This is no exception. I might not buy it again but would recommend to others who like a heady trip.”
“I found JESUS here waiting for the growers to be hooked up w/ JESUS OG-together they can be proud parents of a new hybrid stain called Bigger than Jesus OG" or "2nd Coming of Jesus".

column1: I Love Jesus +Jesus OG would love to meet their offspring if /when the growers can hook them up for new Hybrid creation.”"

column3: “feel nice and happy. juice taste like wine, and cheese it's taste like a good grilled cheese. strain is solid 4.5, extra points though for their price point and minimizing their environmental impact. feel about as happy as I did watching the Sounders score in stoppage time.”
“Hits ya like a fucking bus”

“I really enjoyed this strain, enough to where I had to go right back out and buy more before I can't find it. mine is in concentrate form, wax / budder made by refine seattle. the taste is very floral with some lemon and citrus. I can tell the thc amount is high. nice head high, very euphoric that's probably what stands out the most along with the great taste. U can never go wrong with refine seattle.”
“When people tell me I need Jesús in my life I smoke some of this. Best high I've had in a whiiiiile”
“Dabbed this tonight. Calm and relaxed, but alert. Very nice. Thank you, Jesus.”
“this stuff is really fantastic”
“A great sativa, extremely cerebral and intense lasting effect. I however dont believe this strain was created by Solstice although i am sure they have been dialing it in quite well.”
“I see why they call this strain Jesus. I took One hit and the first thing outta my mouth was, Jesus!" automatically. Two hits and I was blottoed. Fast acting.”"

“I really enjoy the effects of this strain as it provides relaxation and stress relief without causing sedation. It's an uplifting strain that helps fight the blues! Solstice's amazing 5* Bubble Hash has been great for daytime dabbing.”
“Really phenomenal strand”
“Very euphoric and loaded with THC, definitely more on the Sativa side.”

“For me, this strain is a nice Indica heavy buzz. I smoked it at the end of the night, and was already in the mood to chill. The buzz is a nice relaxing body buzz and your mind just kind of wants to puddle some. I really like this for a relaxing movie night strain.”

“Wonderful hybrid.  It works for pain and mood as effortlessly as black magic, and even more for insomnia.  Nice, lemony scent and mild smoke are definite perks, as well.  It also doesn't aggravate my anxiety disorder, simply relaxing me slowly but surely until I feel pleasantly calm and content.  Anyone that gets a chance to try this strain really should take it - I very much doubt there will be many people that will...”
“Really great. I love when I can get my hands onto it. I've only tried one other strain by Solstice and it was good, but Jesus is the best. I try to get it when I find it in stock.”
“Very piney smell & taste. Good body high.”

“I definitely prefer to use this one in a vape to get the full flavor, but the fun doesn't stop there! A mentally uplifting strain while still addressing my back pain. 
#420sweepstakes”

“I bought this from Paper and Leaf on Bainbridge its a very good value as its price is inexpensive but the potency is still very good. A good mellow high no paranoia. Perfect for chilling outside with friends bbq lawn games etc.”
“Borderline giggly buzz, this is a potent yet playful bud”
“Who would've know after all these years Jesus would actually be able to save me. Anxiety free- 10/10. Probably one of the cleanest and smoothest highs one could achieve.”

“this is my favorite and I am usually an indica only type of smoker. I love to smoke this when i wake up and when i’m about to go out because it puts me in the best mood ever without feeling anxious or racey and can keep me up and hyped.”
“What a smooth smoke. I've been waiting for my weed shop to get this and Jesus OG and tonight I hit the jackpot!”
“Loved the smell and taste, most definitely a strain I’d smoke again.”
“very beautiful euphoric high”
“Great flavor great effect very uplifted, i love thus strain”

“I do like this strain a lot! Upon smoking it you feel relaxed. A little euphoric. Be careful standing up because you may feel dizzy! After you calm down, your happy and relaxed! My husband and I went shopping at Ross and it was a lot of fun. Everything seems vivid, and fun. It also keeps you calm. My husband snapped at me on the way home, and I honestly didn’t even wanna fight! I was just happy and chill about it. Wh...”

“Tried Jesus from northwest concentrates and loved my high from one small dab!  The overall happiness, creativity, and carefree mood were a welcome ending to this long day. Will definitely keep this strain on my reoccurring list...”
“Dubbie Brothers are right ! Jesus is all right with me !!! My fave just MELLOW ! Not sleepy Not speedy just Jesus 👍👍👍👍👍”

“I first tried this strain about 1 month ago, didn't really hit me as was said so I laid off. I smoked a bowl of it tonight, WOW! I am feeling a good head buzz and tingling in my hands and the back of my neck, this is what Jesus wants me to feel which is awesome!  Good for anyone, anxiety gets better.”
“Takes away my back and neck pain!”

“I've been dealing with a depressive episode for the last month. After smoking Jesus, I could not stop smiling. It's not super giggly or euphoric so I wouldn't call it upbeat. It just puts you in a good mood, anxieties lessen and you feel like being productive. Minimal munchies and a little bit chatty.

The strain i got is made by Kiana. The leaves were pretty loose but it was only $10 a gram. Great strain for what yo...”
“I really enjoyed the flavor of this strain, it was really nice to enjoy after a long day of working. Highly recommend!”

“Very tasty flowers. Nice clean buzz. Makes you alert and energetically relaxed, if that makes sense?  Great for day tripping and socializing.  No paranoia! Which is good for me and anxiety.  One of my fave hybrids. Praise Jesus.”
“at this moment I am loving it 😎 great smell great taste”

“its ok for what it is...outdo
or fluffy joint material.”
“very calming, mostly heady but very clear, great citrus flavor. 9.5/10”
“actually dabbing jesus crumble and all of the positive affects are multiplied. really heady very stress reducing. highly recommended”
“very awesome hybrid. this strain is light and fluffy and is a good cone down”
“Vaped some wax. Very unpleasant, anxious high. Heavy gravity sucking sensation. Very dizzy.”

“One of my earliest smokes, super smooth inhale, thick and liquid smoke on the exhale. Nice smell, and a serious creeper. Took 10-15 minutes to take effect, starting with tingly skin and limbs. Then WHAM, hits you like a sledgehammer with trippy visuals, lots of big laughter, everything was hilarious. The indica side follows with waves of chill, and a nice calm. You’re gonna want to have some nice music to listen to; ...”
“sounds appetizing,”
